languages.text: "Придержи язык, Монтэг, и не выдавай один случай везения за компетентность!" {n}В воксе слышен топот ног и неразборчивые ругательства. Голос Мастера дисциплины становится задумчив.{/n} "Действительно, логово имеется. Но какое-то оно... невпечатляющее. Все символы их скверной веры — простецкие, грубые. Спальников мало, оружие примитивное, вокс-станция дряхлая, записей о дальнейших планах действия почти нет... У меня сложилось ощущение, что прежде мы имели дело с более серьезным противником".

traits.locale_text: "Придержи язык, Монтэг, и не выдавай один случай везения за компетентность!" {n}В воксе слышен топот ног и неразборчивые ругательства.{/n} "Проклятье! Вижу описи судов с маршрутами и численностью экипажа — сколько кораблей они еще собирались заразить? Только... как-то здесь слишком чисто: ни окурка лхо, ни чашки рекафа. Или это удивительно чистоплотные твари, или они тут недавно. В любом случае сделано — "Обод Эриоха" от мутантов зачищен".

languages.text: "Hold your tongue, Monteg. Don't try to pass off a stroke of luck as competence!" {n}The vox relays the stamping of feet and unintelligible swearing. The Master-at-Arms's voice turns pensive.{/n} "There is a lair, after all. But it is... unimpressive somehow. All the symbols of their foul faith are simple, crude. A few sleeping bags, primitive weapons, a decrepit vox-station, and almost no records of future planned actions... I was of the opinion that our previous foe posed a greater threat than this."
languages.original_text: "Придержи язык, Монтэг, и не выдавай один случай везения за компетентность!" {n}В воксе слышен топот ног и неразборчивые ругательства. Голос Мастера дисциплины становится задумчив.{/n} "Действительно, логово имеется. Но какое-то оно... невпечатляющее. Все символы их скверной веры — простецкие, грубые. Спальников мало, оружие примитивное, вокс-станция дряхлая, записей о дальнейших планах действия почти нет... У меня сложилось ощущение, что прежде мы имели дело с более серьезным противником".

traits.locale_text: "Hold your tongue, Monteg. Don't try to pass off a stroke of luck as competence!" {n}The vox relays the stamping of feet and unintelligible swearing. The Master-at-Arms turns pensive.{/n} "There is a lair, after all. But it is... unimpressive somehow. All the symbols of their foul faith are simple, crude. A few sleeping bags, primitive weapons, an ancient vox-station, and almost no records of future planned actions... Something tells me that we have dealt with worse foes than this."

"Hold your tongue, Monteg. Don't you dare pass off a single stroke of luck for supreme competence!" {n}The vox dutifully relays the stomping of feet and unintelligible swearing.{/n} "Damn! They've got a nice place here. They must have been running the station in secret. The mutants had an inventory of ships with routes and approximate crew size. We can only hope the fall of Heriokh's Rim prevents the spread of the contagion across the Expanse."

The Master-at-Arms turns pensive.{/n} "There is a lair, after all. But it is... unimpressive somehow. All the symbols of their foul faith are simple, crude. A few sleeping bags, primitive weapons, an ancient vox-station, and almost no records of future planned actions... Something tells me that we have dealt with worse foes than this."

We can only hope the fall of Heriokh's Rim prevents the spread of the contagion across the Expanse."

A few sleeping bags, primitive weapons, a decrepit vox-station, and almost no records of future planned actions... I was of the opinion that our previous foe posed a greater threat than this."

languages.text: "Hütet Eure Zunge, Monteg. Versucht nicht, pures Glück als Kompetenz zu verkaufen!" {n}Aus dem Vox-System ertönen das Stampfen von Füßen und unverständliches Gefluche. Die Stimme des Master-at-Arms nimmt einen nachdenklichen Ton an. {/n}"Es gibt also doch ein Versteck. Aber es ist ... irgendwie wenig beeindruckend. Alle Symbole ihres schändlichen Glaubens sind simpel, krude. Ein paar Schlafsäcke, primitive Waffen, eine heruntergekommene Vox-Station und so gut wie gar keine Unterlagen über zukünftig geplante Aktionen ... Ich hatte geglaubt, dass unser früherer Feind eine größere Gefahr darstellt."
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Monteg. Don't try to pass off a stroke of luck as competence!" {n}The vox relays the stamping of feet and unintelligible swearing. The Master-at-Arms's voice turns pensive.{/n} "There is a lair, after all. But it is... unimpressive somehow. All the symbols of their foul faith are simple, crude. A few sleeping bags, primitive weapons, a decrepit vox-station, and almost no records of future planned actions... I was of the opinion that our previous foe posed a greater threat than this."

traits.locale_text: "Hütet Eure Zunge, Monteg. Versucht nicht, pures Glück als Kompetenz zu verkaufen!" {n}Aus dem Vox-System ertönen das Stampfen von Füßen und unverständliches Gefluche. Die Stimme des Master-at-Arms nimmt einen nachdenklichen Ton an. {/n}"Es gibt also doch ein Versteck. Aber es ist ... irgendwie wenig beeindruckend. Alle Symbole ihres schändlichen Glaubens sind simpel, krude. Ein paar Schlafsäcke, primitive Waffen, eine heruntergekommene Vox-Station und so gut wie gar keine Unterlagen über zukünftig geplante Aktionen ... Ich hatte geglaubt, dass unser früherer Feind eine größere Gefahr darstellt."

languages.text: « Tenez votre langue, Monteg. Ne cherchez pas à faire passer un simple coup de chance pour un trait de génie ! » {n}Le vox retransmet les bruits de pas, assortis d'un chapelet de jurons inintelligibles. La voix de la capitaine d'armes se fait songeuse.{/n} « S'il s'agit bel et bien d'un repaire d'illuminés, il faut bien avouer qu'il ne paie pas de mine... Tous les symboles de leur foi impie sont grossiers et rudimentaires. Quelques sacs de couchage, des armes primitives, un vieux poste-vox délabré et presque rien qui laisse présager de futurs attentats... J'ai jugé que notre précédent adversaire représentait une menace autrement plus dangereuse. »
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Monteg. Don't try to pass off a stroke of luck as competence!" {n}The vox relays the stamping of feet and unintelligible swearing. The Master-at-Arms's voice turns pensive.{/n} "There is a lair, after all. But it is... unimpressive somehow. All the symbols of their foul faith are simple, crude. A few sleeping bags, primitive weapons, a decrepit vox-station, and almost no records of future planned actions... I was of the opinion that our previous foe posed a greater threat than this."

traits.locale_text: « Tenez votre langue, Monteg. Ne cherchez pas à faire passer un simple coup de chance pour un trait de génie ! » {n}Le vox retransmet les bruits de pas, assortis d'un chapelet de jurons inintelligibles. La voix de la capitaine d'armes se fait songeuse.{/n} « S'il s'agit bel et bien d'un repaire d'illuminés, il faut bien avouer qu'il ne paie pas de mine... Tous les symboles de leur foi impie sont grossiers et rudimentaires. Quelques sacs de couchage, des armes primitives, un vieux poste-vox délabré et presque rien qui laisse présager de futurs attentats... J'ai jugé que notre précédent adversaire représentait une menace autrement plus dangereuse. »

languages.text: «Cierre el pico, Monteg. ¡No intente hacer pasar un golpe de suerte por destreza!». {n}El voco transmite una serie de pisotones y juramentos incomprensibles. La maestra de armas se vuelve pensativa.{/n} «Pues sí que hay una guarida, pero... es sorprendentemente mediocre. Los símbolos de su fe blasfema son burdos y rudimentarios. Hay unos pocos catres, armas primitivas, una estación de voco vetusta y casi no hay registros de planes de futuro... En mi opinión, nuestros anteriores enemigos eran una amenaza mayor que esta».
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Monteg. Don't try to pass off a stroke of luck as competence!" {n}The vox relays the stamping of feet and unintelligible swearing. The Master-at-Arms's voice turns pensive.{/n} "There is a lair, after all. But it is... unimpressive somehow. All the symbols of their foul faith are simple, crude. A few sleeping bags, primitive weapons, a decrepit vox-station, and almost no records of future planned actions... I was of the opinion that our previous foe posed a greater threat than this."

traits.locale_text: «Cierre el pico, Monteg. ¡No intente hacer pasar un golpe de suerte por destreza!». {n}El voco transmite una serie de pisotones y juramentos incomprensibles. La maestra de armas se vuelve pensativa.{/n} «Pues sí que hay una guarida, pero... es sorprendentemente mediocre. Los símbolos de su fe blasfema son burdos y rudimentarios. Hay unos pocos catres, armas primitivas, una estación de voco vetusta y casi no hay registros de planes de futuro... En mi opinión, nuestros anteriores enemigos eran una amenaza mayor que esta».

languages.text: 「口を慎め、モンテグ。たった一度の幸運を実力だなどとほざくんじゃない！」{n}ヴォクス越しに地団太とわけのわからない罵声が伝わってくる。マスター・アット・アームズの声は物憂げなものに変わる。{/n}「結局、隠れ家はあったのですね。ですが…どうにも見劣りするのです。その邪悪な信仰のシンボルは、すべてが素朴で粗末なものです。寝袋がいくつか、原始的な武器、ボロボロのヴォクスステーション、そして今後の行動計画の記録はほぼありません…以前の敵の方が、こんなのよりも大きな脅威だったように思います」
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Monteg. Don't try to pass off a stroke of luck as competence!" {n}The vox relays the stamping of feet and unintelligible swearing. The Master-at-Arms's voice turns pensive.{/n} "There is a lair, after all. But it is... unimpressive somehow. All the symbols of their foul faith are simple, crude. A few sleeping bags, primitive weapons, a decrepit vox-station, and almost no records of future planned actions... I was of the opinion that our previous foe posed a greater threat than this."

traits.locale_text: 「口を慎め、モンテグ。たった一度の幸運を実力だなどとほざくんじゃない！」{n}ヴォクス越しに地団太とわけのわからない罵声が伝わってくる。マスター・アット・アームズの声は物憂げなものに変わる。{/n}「結局、隠れ家はあったのですね。ですが…どうにも見劣りするのです。その邪悪な信仰のシンボルは、すべてが素朴で粗末なものです。寝袋がいくつか、原始的な武器、ボロボロのヴォクスステーション、そして今後の行動計画の記録はほぼありません…以前の敵の方が、こんなのよりも大きな脅威だったように思います」

languages.text: “闭嘴吧，蒙特格。你不过是运气好而已，还真当你自己有本事了？”{n}通讯器另一边传来了跺脚声和模糊的咒骂声，随后是戒律大师的声音，听起来像是在思考些什么。{/n}“这里确实有个巢穴，但这个巢穴看起来……有点太简陋了。那些邪恶信仰的象征，看起来也有点过于简单粗暴。这里只有几个睡袋、几把不成样子的武器，还有一座破破烂烂的音阵通讯站，而且几乎没有任何关于未来计划的相关记录……在我看来，我们对付过的敌人比这可要危险得多。”
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Monteg. Don't try to pass off a stroke of luck as competence!" {n}The vox relays the stamping of feet and unintelligible swearing. The Master-at-Arms's voice turns pensive.{/n} "There is a lair, after all. But it is... unimpressive somehow. All the symbols of their foul faith are simple, crude. A few sleeping bags, primitive weapons, a decrepit vox-station, and almost no records of future planned actions... I was of the opinion that our previous foe posed a greater threat than this."

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴吧，蒙特格。你不过是运气好而已，还真当你自己有本事了？”{n}通讯器另一边传来了跺脚声和模糊的咒骂声，随后是戒律大师的声音，听起来像是在思考些什么。{/n}“这里确实有个巢穴，但这个巢穴看起来……有点太简陋了。那些邪恶信仰的象征，看起来也有点过于简单粗暴。这里只有几个睡袋、几把不成样子的武器，还有一座破破烂烂的音阵通讯站，而且几乎没有任何关于未来计划的相关记录……在我看来，我们对付过的敌人比这可要危险得多。”

languages.text: "Diline hâkim ol Monteg. Şansın yaver gitti diye kendini becerikli gibi göstermeye çalışma!" {n}Vokstan yere vurulup duran bir ayak sesiyle anlaşılmaz küfürler yayılıyor. Silahtar'ın sesine endişe yayılıyor.{/n} "En azından bir in varmış ama... Beklediğimiz kadar etkileyici çıkmadı. Habis inançlarına dair tüm o semboller basit, kaba saba şeyler. Birkaç uyku tulumu, ilkel silah, külüstür bir voks istasyonu bulduk ve gelecekteki eylem planlarına dair neredeyse hiçbir kayıt yok. Bir önceki düşmanımızın bundan daha büyük tehlike teşkil ettiği kanısındayım."
languages.original_text: "Hold your tongue, Monteg. Don't try to pass off a stroke of luck as competence!" {n}The vox relays the stamping of feet and unintelligible swearing. The Master-at-Arms's voice turns pensive.{/n} "There is a lair, after all. But it is... unimpressive somehow. All the symbols of their foul faith are simple, crude. A few sleeping bags, primitive weapons, a decrepit vox-station, and almost no records of future planned actions... I was of the opinion that our previous foe posed a greater threat than this."
